textPlain: I still have my zx-81, it powers up but the keyboard membrane is long gone. Learnt z80 assembly on it. Good times.

Yeah me too in 1982, using the Melbourne House Z80 reference, aged a young 10 years old.  Working with POKE and no macro-assembler, I wrote mnemonics then translated them to machine-code by hand.  A baptism of fire that to this day that I've not forgotten.This book was the ignition that changed my life...
